    • Constructor Detail

      • MapMenuWidget

        public MapMenuWidget()
        Radial menu container containing buttons and controlling layout.

    • Method Detail

      • getExplicitSizing

        public boolean getExplicitSizing()
        Get whether *any* of the sizing of buttons has been explicitly set in configuration. Default values applied while reading missing configuration are not considered explicit.
        Returns:
        true if any of the width, span, or radius were specified.

      • getButtonSpan

        public float getButtonSpan()
        Provides expected arc length of each button.
        Returns:
        button span dimension.

      • getCoveredAngle

        public float getCoveredAngle()
        Get the total angle that the radiol menu spans in degrees.
        Returns:
        current total angle the radial menu will cover.

      • setCoveredAngle

        public void setCoveredAngle(float angle)
        Set the total angle that the radiol menu spans in degrees. Covered angle must be positive and less than 360 degrees in total.
        Parameters:
        angle -

      • getStartAngle

        public float getStartAngle()
        Get the angle in degrees that locates the middle of the first child button.
        Returns:
        positional angle for the first child button.

      • setStartAngle

        public void setStartAngle(float angle)
        Set the angle in degrees that locates the middle of the first child button. Angle to be set should be between -180 and 180 degrees. A value of -90 degrees is straight down, 0 is to the screen right, 90 is straight up, and 180 is to the screen left.

      • getInnerRadius

        public float getInnerRadius()
        Gets the default inside radius of the radial menu in display adjusted pixel units.
        Returns:
        current inside radius

      • setInnerRadius

        public void setInnerRadius(float radius)
        Sets the default inside radius of the radial menu in display adjusted pixel units. Inner radius value is used as a default to locate child buttons, but this value does not change button positioning after layout operations.
        Parameters:
        radius -

      • getButtonWidth

        public float getButtonWidth()
        Gets the default radial width of child buttons in display adjusted pixel units.
        Returns:
        default width of child buttons

      • setButtonWidth

        public void setButtonWidth(float width)
        Sets the default radial width of child buttons in display adjusted pixel units.
        Parameters:
        width - to be used to size buttons by default

      • isClockwiseWinding

        public boolean isClockwiseWinding()
        Gets the sequencing convention for the menu's child buttons. Clockwise winding is along an axis into the screen using a right handed convention. The default winding is counter clockwise, or a default return value of false.
        Returns:
        whether winding of child buttons is clockwise

      • setClockwiseWinding

        public void setClockwiseWinding(boolean winding)
        Sets the sequencing convention for the menu's child buttons. Clockwise winding is along an axis into the screen using a right handed convention.
        Parameters:
        winding - desired for the layout sequencing of buttons

      • onWidgetCanBeAdded

        public boolean onWidgetCanBeAdded(int index,
                                  MapWidget widget)
        Overrides:
        onWidgetCanBeAdded in class AbstractParentWidget
